# The `DebugObject` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The plugin creates a debug object from when JITLink starts processing the corresponding <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::orc::DebugObject</CodeBlock>

## Derived Classes

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/elfdebugobject">ELFDebugObject</a></>}>
The current implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/elfdebugobject">ELFDebugObject</a> replicates the approach used in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimedyld">RuntimeDyld</a>: It patches executable and data section headers in the given object buffer with load-addresses of their corresponding sections in target memory. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/elfdebugobject/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

The plugin creates a debug object from when JITLink starts processing the corresponding <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a>.

It provides access to the pass configuration of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> and calls the finalization function, once the resulting link artifact was emitted.

Definition at line 114 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/debugobjectmanagerplugin-cpp">DebugObjectManagerPlugin.cpp</a>.
